title: Analysis of the Learning Effects of Aesthetic Elements in e-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic digital learning tool usage
context.additional_context: A social domain job-linked curriculum conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, focusing on analyzing the impact of aesthetic elements when utilizing multimedia resources.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how positive/negative aesthetic elements in e-learning content affect cognitive load.
Learners can comparatively analyze differences in learning outcomes based on design types (positive/negative).
Learners can propose and evaluate suitable e-learning design strategies for limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
